levels.description: Slash <@ba.vup>10</> times, each dealing <@ba.vup>{d_atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to up to <@ba.vup>{max_target}</> enemies. Talent trigger chance increases to <@ba.vup>{prob:0%}</>, and continuously drags enemies towards self, with <@ba.vup>moderate</> force. Then deal <@ba.vup>{e_atk_scale_end:0%}</> of ATK as Physical damage once, and drag enemies towards self with <@ba.vup>significant</> force
